name: V.O.S.S. Turbo
storyline: Mr. Wally wishes to create a theme park and is putting his faith into his brave Wally Cadets. As a new cadet, it is your job to collect the resources needed to bring this dream into reality! Mr. Wally is so generous, that he gifts* each new Cadet with a space cruiser for your travels in the universe (Lease to own). The busy Mr. Wally wishes to give you some words of encouragement before your first adventure, "Travel inter-dimensionally through infinite lands, conquer them, and extract their essence for my enjoyment!"
summary: VOSS Turbo is a retro styled, on rail, twin stick shooter with controller and keyboard support. Gameplay difficulty will climb as you visit and conquer new worlds. 30 stages to explore, with secrets to uncover, and bosses to whoop. Explore everything the multiverse has to offer!
